title: How to Make Agar Fruit Gel

steps.headline: Add the juice and agar flakes to the saucepan.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Stir constantly until the flakes dissolve.
Fold in the berries or chopped fruit.
Place in the fridge to set for 30 minutes.
steps.description: Serve once set. The gel can be spooned out or cut into squares for serving.

text: Add the juice and agar flakes to the saucepan. Stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2-3 minutes.  Stir constantly until the flakes dissolve.  Pour into the bowl. Allow to sit for 10 minutes. Fold in the berries or chopped fruit.  Place in the fridge to set for 30 minutes. Serve once set. The gel can be spooned out or cut into squares for serving. Finished.
